sentences: Reflecting on the reports from co- facilitators and comments from negotiators, President Pronk noted the momentum generated.
He invited delegates to continue negotiating into the night in informal consultations, and asked the co-facilitators to report back to him at 8:30 am on Thursday.
He said he would then convene a meeting of the informal Plenary, and report on further progress made during the night.
He said he would submit his own proposal for a package deal should negotiations reach a deadlock.
He then closed the informal Plenary at 11:20 pm.
enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
